00070 //             THE COMMUNICATION MACROS                  //
00072 
00073 #define ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN(T) \
00074 static gp_mm<T>* global_##T##_mm = gp_mm<T>::get();     \
00075 class ml_tlm2_##T##_companion: public ml_tlm2_gp_companion { \
00076 public: \
00077   ml_tlm2_##T##_companion():ml_tlm2_gp_companion(#T) { } \
00078   ~ml_tlm2_##T##_companion() {} \
00079   virtual void * create_class(const std::string& name = "") { \
00080     return global_##T##_mm->allocate(); \
00081   } \
00082   virtual void uvm_ml_automation(uvm_ml_packer * p, void * actual_arg, void* other_arg, ml_tlm2_oper op) { \
00083     T * actual UVM_UNUSED_ATTR = (T*) actual_arg; \
00084     T * other UVM_UNUSED_ATTR = (T*) other_arg;
00085 
00086 #define ML_TLM2_GP_END(T) \
00087   } \
00088 }; \
00089 static bool ml_tlm2_##T##_dummy UVM_UNUSED_ATTR = uvm_ml_class_company::register_class_companion(typeid(T), new ml_tlm2_##T##_companion());
00090 
00091 #define ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN(T) \
00092 class ml_tlm2_##T##_companion: public ml_tlm2_ext_companion { \
00093 public: \
00094   ml_tlm2_##T##_companion():ml_tlm2_ext_companion(#T) { } \
00095   ~ml_tlm2_##T##_companion() {} \
00096   virtual void * create_class(const std::string& name = "") { \
00097     return new T; \
00098   } \
00099   unsigned int get_ext_id(tlm_extension_base * ext) { \
00100     T * act = dynamic_cast<T *>(ext); \
00101     return act->ID; \
00102   } \
00103   virtual tlm_extension_base * get_other_ext(tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp) {  \
00104     T * other_ext = NULL; \
00105     tlm_gp->get_extension(other_ext); \
00106     return other_ext; \
00107   } \
00108   virtual void uvm_ml_automation(uvm_ml_packer * p, void * actual_arg, void* other_arg, ml_tlm2_oper op) { \
00109     T * actual = (T*) actual_arg;      \
00110     T * other = (T*) other_arg;
00111 
00112 #define ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_END(T)   \
00113   } \
00114 }; \
00115 static bool ml_tlm2_##T##_dummy UVM_UNUSED_ATTR = uvm_ml_class_company::register_class_companion(typeid(T), new ml_tlm2_##T##_companion());
00116 
00117 // Macro ML_TLM2_FIELD defines a fragment of ml_tlm2_automation for the 
00118 // specific field
00119 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD(f) \
00120   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) \
00121     (*p) << actual->f;              \
00122   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) \
00123     (*p) >> actual->f; \
00124   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) \
00125     actual->f = other->f;
00126     
00127 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_DELETABLE(f) \
00128   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) \
00129     (*p) << actual->f;              \
00130   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) \
00131     (*p) >> actual->f;              \
00132   else if (op == ML_TLM2_DELETE_OP) { \
00133     if (actual->f) {                            \
00134       delete actual->f; \
00135       actual->f = NULL; \
00136     } \
00137   } else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) {      \
00138     actual->f->copy(other->f);                  \
00139   }
00140 
00141 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_ENUM(T,f)       \
00142   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP)          \
00143     (*p) << (int) actual->f;        \
00144   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) { \
00145     int tmp;                          \
00146     (*p) >> tmp;                      \
00147     actual->f = (T)tmp;             \
00148   }                                   \
00149   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) \
00150     actual->f = other->f;
00151 
00152 #define ML_TLM2_LOCAL(f) actual->f
00153 
00154 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_ARRAY(T,f,n) \
00155   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) {     \
00156     (*p) << n;                     \
00157     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)    \
00158       (*p) << actual->f[j];        \
00159   } \
00160   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) { \
00161     T tmp;                            \
00162     int sz;                           \
00163     (*p) >> sz;                       \
00164     if (sz)                           \
00165       actual->f = new T[sz];          \
00166     for (int j = 0; j < sz; j++) {    \
00167       (*p) >> tmp;                    \
00168        actual->f[j] = tmp;            \
00169     }                                 \
00170   }                                   \
00171   else if (op == ML_TLM2_DELETE_OP) { \
00172     if (n && (actual->f != NULL)) {   \
00173        delete [] actual->f;           \
00174        actual->f = NULL;              \
00175     }                                 \
00176   }                                   \
00177   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) { \
00178     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)    \
00179       actual->f[j] = other->f[j];  \
00180   } 
00181 
00182 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_ARRAY_ENUM(T,f,n) \
00183   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) {     \
00184     (*p) << n;                     \
00185     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)    \
00186       (*p) << (int) (actual->f[j]);\
00187   } \
00188   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) { \
00189     int tmp;                          \
00190     int sz;                           \
00191     (*p) >> sz;                       \
00192     if (sz)                           \
00193       actual->f = new T[sz];          \
00194     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {     \
00195        (*p) >> tmp;                   \
00196        actual->f[j] = (T) tmp;        \
00197     }                                 \
00198   } \
00199   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) { \
00200     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)    \
00201       actual->f[j] = other->f[j];  \
00202   }  
00203                                  
00204 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_ACCESSORS(T, getr, setr) \
00205   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) \
00206     (*p) << actual->getr(); \
00207   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) { \
00208     T t; \
00209     (*p) >> t; \
00210     actual->setr(t); \
00211     } \
00212   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) \
00213     actual->setr(other->getr());
00214 
00215 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_ENUM_ACCESSORS(T, getr, setr) \
00216   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) \
00217     (*p) << (int) actual->getr(); \
00218   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) { \
00219     int tmp; \
00220     (*p) >> tmp; \
00221     actual->setr((T) tmp); \
00222     } \
00223  else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) \
00224     actual->setr(other->getr());
00225 
00226 ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN(tlm_generic_payload) \
00227 ML_TLM2_GP_END(tlm_generic_payload)
00228 
00229 #endif
